APPINSIGHTS_INSTRUMENTATIONKEY: <add instrumentation key for the app insights instance we will log to>

AzureAppConfiguration.PrimaryRegionEndpoint: <<add uri to the azure app configuration instance in the primary region if we can use a managed identity to authenticate>>
AzureAppConfiguration.SecondaryRegionEndpoint: <<add uri to the azure app configuration instance in the failover region if we can use a managed identity to authenticate>>
